results.name: Roleras de ayer, hoy y siempre

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

results.name: When I die (3 week first solo dev project)
Out of Sight (itch) (patetfisk, Damien Hallstrom, Simon Norrmén, Clara Cox, Morathic, Renuilz, PerHallros)
